group_1.narration: My name is Konoha Shizumi.@I grew up in [textRed:Azalea House] with...
[textRed:Hazuki Yusa] and [textRed:Ayame Mikuri], and@we all became Magical Girls together.

group_1.textRight: No one stands a chance against you, Konoha.
Wahaaa! You're tellin' me! She can do@anythin'!

group_1.narration: I am the oldest in our group.
I managed the finances and our budget.@I decided how we fought as Magical Girls@and made decisions to keep us alive.
Not to brag, but I could do almost@anything.
I'm willing to learn anything if it's for@us three. I've resolved myself to.
However...@Even with all my dedication and effort,@there's something even I have yet to achieve.
It is the most difficult challenge that I,@Konoha Shizumi, must overcome.@This is the story of how I overcame myself.

group_1.textRight: Sorry 'bout this, but...would you guys@mind eating dinner without me?
Student council is lasting forever and@I don't think I can skip out this time.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so?  I'll just have dinner with@Ayame, then?

group_1.textRight: If that's okay! Order something in!@Treat yourself!
It'll be my treat! Let me make up for@not joining you.
I think Ayame'll be super happy!

group_1.textLeft: All right. Be safe on your way home.

group_1.textRight: Was that Hazuki on the phone?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, she'll be a little late coming home@today.

group_1.textRight: Oh, whaaat... Then what're we gonna@eat for dinner?!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, that's right. You've never had my@home cooking, have you, Ayame?

group_1.textRight: I kinda feel like Hazuki told me never@to let you cook...
But ya know! I've always wondered what@somethinâ€™ made by you would taste like.
Yeah! I wanna eat your cookin'!@Let's do it!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you! I'll make you something@delicious then.
